doc.after: The most expensive transportation options aside from renting a car are taxis shuttle services and limousines Taxis and shuttles provide flat rates to popular destinations within Miami such as Brickell Downtown and South Beach Taxis and shuttles can be hailed at the ground floor arrivals or at the Miami Central Station by taking the MIA Mover to the train station
